item.title: LME关键价差再次飙升，铝挤压效应持续蔓延
item.description: 铝市场的压力继续增大，伦敦金属交易所 10 月份交割的合约比 11 月份的溢价更高，这表明铝市场受到的挤压越来越大。【原文：Pressure in the aluminum market continues to build, as contracts for October delivery on the London Metal Exchange trade at an even higher premium over November in a sign of a mounting squeeze.】

item.title: 爱尔兰发布公司税优惠赠款预算案
item.description: 爱尔兰政府公布了 2025 年的丰厚预算，向选民提供了多项优惠，这要归功于创纪录的公司税收入预测和苹果公司补缴税款带来的丰厚财政收入。【原文：Ireland’s government has delivered a bonanza budget for 2025, handing voters several giveaways, thanks to flush coffers boosted by forecast record corporation tax receipts and Apple Inc back taxes.】

item.title: Northvolt 支持者向电池公司 Polarium 投资 4900 万美元
item.description: 电池存储公司 Polarium Energy Solutions AB 在新一轮融资中筹集了 5 亿瑞典克朗（合 4,900 万美元）的资金，该轮融资得到了持有陷入困境的电池制造商 Northvolt AB 股份的投资者的支持。【原文：Battery-storage company Polarium Energy Solutions AB raised 500 million Swedish kronor ($49 million) in a fresh funding round backed by investors with stakes in beleaguered battery maker Northvolt AB.】

item.title: 印度采取措施遏制股票衍生品交易热潮
item.description: 印度证券监管机构周二通报了限制该国股票衍生品交易激增的措施，因为越来越多的散户参与其中，使投机性押注达到了世界最高水平。【原文：India’s securities regulator on Tuesday notified steps to limit a surge in equity derivatives trading in the nation after growing retail participation took the speculative bets to the highest in the world.】

item.title: Intesa 股票大涨后成为欧盟最大的上市贷款机构
item.description: Intesa Sanpaolo SpA 银行今年股价大涨，首次超过桑坦德银行，成为欧盟市值最大的银行。【原文：Intesa Sanpaolo SpA became the European Union’s largest lender by market value for the first time, overtaking Banco Santander SA after a surge in the Italian bank’s share price this year.】

item.title: 意大利联合信贷银行首席执行官称欧盟需要更大的银行，并将目光投向德国商业银行
item.description: UniCredit SpA 首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 正在寻求收购德国竞争对手 Commerzbank AG。【原文：UniCredit SpA Chief Executive Officer Andrea Orcel, who’s pursuing a potential takeover of German rival Commerzbank AG, said Europe’s banks aren’t large enough to cover the bloc’s funding needs.】

item.title: 石油巨头重启与哈萨克斯坦政府就 50 亿美元卡沙甘硫磺罚款的谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，卡沙干巨型油田的合作伙伴已重启与哈萨克斯坦当局的谈判，旨在解决潜在的 50 亿美元环境罚款问题。【原文：Partners in the giant Kashagan oil field have restarted talks with the Kazakh authorities aimed at settling a potential $5 billion environmental fine, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国融资市场波动助推 SOFR 主要基准指数飙升
item.description: 作为美国金融体系基础的一个关键利率在 9 月底大幅跳升，这表明围绕本季度末的波动已经卷土重来。【原文：A key rate underlying the US financial system jumped sharply at the end of September, an indication that volatility surrounding the end of the quarter has returned.】

item.title: 台风 "克利斯朵夫 "关闭了台湾价值 2.5 万亿美元的股票市场
item.description: 超强台风克拉森带着强风和暴雨逼近台湾，台湾将关闭 2.5 万亿美元的股票市场。【原文：Taiwan will close its $2.5 trillion stock market as Super Typhoon Krathon approaches the island with strong winds and heavy rain.】

item.title: 俄罗斯钢铁业亿万富翁涉足广受欢迎的婴儿食品
item.description: 亿万富翁弗拉基米尔-利辛（Vladimir Lisin）是俄罗斯最大钢铁公司的所有者，他已同意收购一家婴儿食品生产商，该公司在当地与百事公司（PepsiCo Inc.【原文：Billionaire Vladimir Lisin, the owner of Russia’s biggest steel company, has agreed to purchase a baby-food producer that competes locally with PepsiCo Inc., diversifying his business portfolio inside the country.】

item.title: 阿达尼旗舰公司价值 13 亿美元的股份销售据称将于下周启动
item.description: 据知情人士透露，亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的旗舰公司计划最早于下周推出股票出售计划，这标志着该公司在 2023 年的一份尖锐的做空报告破坏了之前的计划之后，重返公开股票市场。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani’s flagship firm plans to roll out its share sale as early as next week, according to people familiar, marking its return to public equity markets after a scathing short-seller report in 2023 derailed a previous plan.】

item.title: Blackstone 主导防盗技术制造商的私人信贷交易
item.description: 据一位熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 为 Graham Partners Inc. 的 Gatekeeper Systems 提供了 5.5 亿美元的私人信贷交易，该公司生产用于检测盗窃行为的购物车技术。【原文：Blackstone Inc. provided a $550 million private credit deal for Graham Partners Inc.’s Gatekeeper Systems, which makes technology for shopping carts designed to detect theft, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南非寻求英国投资者资助基础设施计划
item.description: 南非的基础设施发展机构重新调整了其规划项目管道，使其对私营部门更具吸引力，因为国家官员在英国向投资者示好。【原文：South Africa’s infrastructure development agency has restructured its pipeline of planned projects to make them more attractive to the private sector as state officials court investors in the UK.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚任职时间最长的中央银行行长将获得新任命
item.description: 罗马尼亚的穆古尔-伊萨雷斯库（Mugur Isarescu）准备延长他作为世界上任职时间最长的央行行长的任期，此前立法者初步批准了他新的五年任期。【原文：Romania’s Mugur Isarescu is poised to extend his tenure as the world’s longest-serving central bank governor after lawmakers gave initial approval for a new five-year term.】

item.title: 阿波罗预计五年内年收入达 100 亿美元
item.description: 在投资者对私人信贷和年金需求的推动下，阿波罗全球管理公司预计到 2029 年，其资产管理和退休业务的年收益将达到 100 亿美元。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. expects to generate $10 billion of annual earnings across its asset management and retirement businesses by 2029, driven by investor demand for private credit and annuities.】

item.title: 美国反垄断局长打破页岩油与欧佩克之间的暧昧关系
item.description:
在休斯顿与卡特尔成员共进晚餐让一些美国石油高管耿耿于怀。【原文：

Dining with cartel members in Houston has come back to haunt some American oil executives.

】

item.title: 德国 1,000 亿美元的交易激增令欧洲其他国家望尘莫及
item.description: 过去几周，德国大宗并购案频发，交易额已接近 1,000 亿美元，超过了欧洲其他国家的增幅，给银行家们带来了今年余下时间复苏的希望。【原文：A flurry of big-ticket German acquisitions over the past few weeks has taken deal volumes to nearly $100 billion, outpacing gains in the rest of Europe and giving bankers hope of a resurgence for the remainder of the year.】

item.title: 装满爆炸物的无人船在红海撞上油轮
item.description: 一艘满载炸药的无人艇在驶过也门海岸时撞上了一艘油轮，这表明以色列的空袭并没有阻止该国胡塞武装分子对商业航运的袭击。【原文：An explosive-laden drone boat slammed into an oil tanker as it sailed past the coast of Yemen, a sign Israeli airstrikes haven’t deterred the country’s Houthi militants from attacking commercial shipping.】

item.title: 红牛的繁荣时代在新领导层的挑战中褪色
item.description: 红牛公司在经历了一段快速扩张期后，去年的增长放缓，成本上升和美国饮料市场的激烈竞争侵蚀了利润。【原文：Red Bull GmbH’s growth slowed last year after a period of rapid expansion, with rising costs and fierce competition in the US drinks market eating into margins.】

item.title: 德国商业银行的奥洛普称其战略 "建立在独立基础之上
item.description: 德国商业银行股份公司（Commerzbank AG）新任首席执行官贝蒂娜-奥洛普（Bettina Orlopp）在上任第一天就力图振臂一呼，承诺倡导建立在银行独立性基础上的战略。【原文：Commerzbank AG’s new Chief Executive Officer Bettina Orlopp sought to rally the troops on her first day in office, pledging to advocate for a strategy built on the bank’s independence.】

item.title: 人工智能疲劳"、高倍率抑制反弹，微软股价下跌
item.description: 在过去的几个月里，微软公司的股票失去了光彩，一些投资者对人工智能交易降温，希望在该行业的其他地方寻找更好的价值。【原文：Microsoft Corp. shares have lost their luster in the past few months, with some investors cooling on the artificial-intelligence trade and looking for better value elsewhere in the sector.】

item.title: Meta 和德国电信的数据成本之争只会愈演愈烈
item.description: 陷入困境的欧洲电信公司又要面对一个问题。但首先...【原文：Struggling European telecom companies have another problem to deal with. But first...】

item.title: Equinix 与加拿大养老金公司及 GIC 组建价值 150 多亿美元的合资企业
item.description: Equinix Inc. 与加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investment Board）和新加坡 GIC 私人有限公司（GIC Pte）成立了一家合资企业，以开发新的数据中心。【原文：Equinix Inc. formed a joint venture with Canada Pension Plan Investment Board and Singapore’s GIC Pte to develop new data centers.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚 Threadneedle 公司认为英镑将因利率押注而反弹至 1.50 美元
item.description: Columbia Threadneedle Investments 认为，随着英国放松政策的步伐慢于美国，英镑将攀升至英国脱欧投票前的水平，这是迄今为止同行中最看涨英镑的观点。【原文：Columbia Threadneedle Investments sees the pound climbing to levels last seen before the Brexit vote, by far the most bullish call among peers, as the UK eases policy at a slower pace than the US.】

item.title: 贡渥集团老板确信中东冲突不会损害石油供应
item.description: 贡渥集团主席兼联合创始人表示，他相信中东地区不断升级的冲突不会影响该地区的原油供应。【原文：Gunvor Group’s chairman and co-founder said he’s confident the escalating conflict in the Middle East won’t hit crude supply from the region.】

item.title: 私募股权投资为何如此低迷
item.description:
一个靠举债度日的行业希望未来会有更好的日子和更多的交易。降低利率能否为卷土重来创造条件？【原文：

An industry that runs on debt is hoping better days — and more dealmaking — are ahead. Can lower interest rates set the stage for a comeback?

】

item.title: CVC支持的Zabka华沙首次公开募股计划筹资16.7亿美元
item.description: 以私募股权基金 CVC Capital Partners Plc 为首的投资者寻求在欧洲最大的连锁便利店波兰 Zabka Group SA 的首次公开募股中筹集高达 64.5 亿兹罗提（16.7 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Investors led by private equity fund CVC Capital Partners Plc seek to raise as much as 6.45 billion zloty ($1.67 billion) in an initial public offering of Poland’s Zabka Group SA, Europe’s largest chain of convenience stores.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。鲍威尔认为 "随着时间的推移"，削减将到来；波音公司考虑筹资 100 亿美元；美国港口工人举行大规模罢工。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Powell sees cuts coming “over time,” Boeing considers raising $10 billion and a major walkout by US port workers. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 海底电缆初创公司 XLCC 旨在为英国工厂筹资 10 亿英镑
item.description: 英国初创公司 XLCC Ltd. 旨在筹集超过 10 亿英镑（13 亿美元）的资金，用于在苏格兰建立一家工厂，生产对欧洲摆脱化石燃料至关重要的海底高压电缆。【原文：The British startup XLCC Ltd. aims to raise over £1 billion ($1.3 billion) for a factory in Scotland manufacturing subsea high-voltage cables vital for Europe’s transition away from fossil fuels.】

item.title: 波音公司考虑出售股票筹资至少 100 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉相关讨论的人士透露，波音公司正在考虑通过出售新股筹集至少 100 亿美元的资金，因为这家飞机制造商正寻求补充因持续罢工而进一步耗尽的现金储备。【原文：Boeing Co. is considering raising at least $10 billion by selling new stock, as the planemaker seeks to replenish cash reserves depleted further by an ongoing strike, according to people familiar with the discussions.】
